transcript:
Customer: Ajmer hai.
kaise kate din raat kaise ho tujhse
haan boliye.
hello
Executive: Haan sir bataiye.
Customer: Haan hello.
Executive: Haan bataiye sir kaise consume nahi karta rahe screenshot dijiye mujhe kya likha raha hai kyuki aisa to hai nahi aapka bylead balance bhi hai to aap consume kar payenge sab kuch.
Customer: Ek second.
Executive: West Bengal ki lead hai.
Customer: Are abhi abhi aa gaya West Bengal.
Executive: Ho gaya na consume ho gaya?
Customer: Haan ho gaya.
Executive: Hai na wohi to keh raha hu aapke number se dusre number se chal nahi raha hoga nahi to aapne bhi ispe call kara to woh ho gaya aisa nahi hai sir consume ho jayega aapka dekh lo bhi hoga na.
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi to.
Executive: Par maine to bola hi tha us din hi baat hui thi maine kaha tha aapko thoda dheere dheere suno suno suno dobara dikha rahe hai dobara dikha rahe hai aapko main whatsapp mein aap hi bhejiye main dikha raha hu aapko.
Customer: Ab bheja hua hai.
Executive: Kis number pe bheja hai?
Customer: Is number pe bhi bhejo.
Executive: Is number pe bhejo.
Customer: Bhej diya.
Executive: Iska aapka net nahi chal raha kya?
Customer: Nahi ye to nahi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Abhi aaya nahi hai ispe hai dono pe bhej diya maine aapke us wale number pe bhi.
Customer: 843608401 par.
Executive: Bhej diya us pe bhi.
Customer: Whatsapp pe bheja hai na aapne isko nahi aaya abhi tak.
Executive: Aapka net nahi chal raha hai is wajah se nahi ho raha sir us number pe maine to bhej diya hai.
Customer: Shayad call chal raha hai iski wajah se lagta hai nahi chal raha hai.
Executive: Haan is wajah se nahi chal raha dusre wale pe dusre wale pe bhej dijiye na screenshot waha se idhar se udhar.
Customer: Theek theek hai main aapko bhejta hu call kat kar bhejta hu aapko.
Executive: Fir call kariye mujhe aur kya.
Customer: Nahi karta main to aapko call.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to consume buyleads.

- Screenshot not received on WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how buyleads are consumed.

- Executive sent a screenshot on WhatsApp.

- Suggested sending screenshot to another number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send screenshot after call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, consume, screenshot, whatsapp
